Reviews.Title: best phone I've ever had
Reviews.Author: J. Blankenship
Reviews.Content: the kick slider is the best feature about the phone.  i only really use a phone for talking, and this feature makes speaking much better.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and International 3G compatibility via 2100 UMTS/HSDPA
Kick-slider mechanism achieves a "fit-to-face" profile by gliding open in a curve to match your facial contour.
2 megapixel camera with 8x zoom and lumi LED light, video record and playback capabilities (at 30 fps).
QVGA display with 16 million colors; Bluetooth for handsfree communication and stereo music streaming; MicroSD memory expansion.
Up to 7 hours of talk time, up to 16 days of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MOTORIZR Z8 Black Unlocked Triband GSM Phone
